info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 5:44PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Gallatin County through 630 PM MDT... At 542 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Manhattan, or 19 miles northwest of Bozeman, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Belgrade, Manhattan, Logan, Amsterdam, Four Corners, Bozeman Hot Springs, Gallatin Gateway, Church Hill and Madison Buffalo Jump State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Cloud to ground lightning may occur with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
